channel.title: Lolism.org ~~ Rate, Advice & Feedback?
channel.description:
[center][center][url=http://www.lolism.org][img]http://i9.tinypic.com/85u3j1w.png[/img][/url][/center]
[hr]
[b]Recent updates and news!;[/b] I've just fixed a few problems people have been suggesting. And a few of my own. I've messed up my stylesheet somewhere andd I can't find the cursor change. I'll get it fixed asap :)
[b]I NEED AFFILIATES, FRIEND SITES, SISTER SITES ETC![/b]
[b]Intoduction;[/b] Lolism.org is my new project. Usually when I make a site, I fail to stay committed, and thus lose an opertunity to learn more and more about web development.
So, I had to think of a project which I could commit myself to properly. I thought about a blog, which sounded kinda boring so I decided on a Funny Picture site. I know this sounds generic, and unoriginal, but I doubt that any of you can find a site where most of the pictures genuinely amuse you, that's why my site is a complilation of all the images over the internet which are actually [b]FUNNY[/b]!
I started this project at new year, and one of my resolutions is to learn PHP. I'm not very far yet, but I'm learning steadily. So if you could post some PHP help aswell, that'd be cool! :)
Since I've posted this here, I've had numerous suggestions from numerous people. Since then, I've made a new layout, which is easier on the eyes, and the brain. I STILL NEED ADVICE ON HOW TO IMPROVE! :)
Yeahh, I know the crosshair cursor is fugly as uck, but I'll fix it next time I update :)
[hr]
[b]So far in this project I have learned;[/b] [size=8pt]Nested tables Clean PNG transparencies More CSS and HTML More JavaScript How to automate image resizing Dreamweaver MX2004 is ftl. Basic PHP [/size][/center]
[center][b]Triumphs so far;[/b] [size=8pt]Fulfils purpose Easy to use Amusing Fixed a few problems Fully working contact form![/size]
[b]Problems so far;[/b] [size=8pt]Background does not expand correctly Image upload is not automatic Too much advertising ([i]I need the cash[/i]) Not many pictures yet (40) Not enough friend/sister sites[/size]
[b]Marks out of 10[/b] [size=8pt]Ease to navigate Aesthetics (Graphics etc) Level of amusement Theme/Colour scheme [/size]
Please can you state more problems and triumphs, and explain ways of improving. And leave marks out of ten for all the areas stated. :)
[/center]
[hr]
[center][b]Your suggestions;[/b] [size=8pt][s][b]S!ms:[/b] Clean up the background. Round the bottom. :)[/s] [b]Pwnd:[/b] Ban PNG transparencies from the internet[/size] [s][b]Pwnd:[/b] Fix the picture page to accommodate bigger images.[/size][/s]
I'd be extremely grateful if you could offer some suggestions to improve the site. Just anything that will make it that little bit better!
[hr]
[b]Accessing the Site;[/b] To access lolism.org [url=http://www.lolism.org][b]click here[/b][/url]! or go to [b]www.lolism.org[/b]
If anyone wants one, I'm offering free subdomains! [size=12pt][b]yournamehere[/b].lolism.org[/size] Just reply here, or add me on msn.
[b]Contacting me;[/b] You can contact me here or through msn. My address is: jamesalexanderlindsay@hotmail.com
[hr]
-[b]JV[/b][/center][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2008, 09:25:50 AM[/size][hr]Just added todays 31 images :)

item.title: Lolism.org ~~ Rate, Advice & Feedback?
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

I don’t know you, so where’d you get pics from my and my sister’s photobuckets? =/

Nice site JV, got some good laughs from it. It looks (almost) professional too(imo).

Check out this ad that was on your site: http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/imgad?id=COffuKbB59vhzgEQoAEYwgQyCHOMBtvj02cb
;)[/quote]
like i said, i got all the images from the funny image thread in general discussion

And with lightbox if you use ‘rel=“lightbox[roadtrip]”’ then you can use the arrow keys to change pictures.

item.title: Lolism.org ~~ Rate, Advice & Feedback?
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Get a php host, and name them 1.jpg, 2.jpg, 3.jpg, etc, and use a loop.
You wouldnt even need javascript if you wanted.

Just make it like page numbers. I could help you on it, if you need it, message me.

Read full topic

item.title: Lolism.org ~~ Rate, Advice & Feedback?
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Oh, I just used Lightbox for it (:

Read full topic

item.title: Lolism.org ~~ Rate, Advice & Feedback?
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“Kollidierende, post:60, topic:169671”]Well, what i would suggest is that you add a little link under the picture that says “View All”. And when they click that a list comes up in a new window. And on the list you should have links to all of the pictures and when they click it a little window comes up with that picture.
Example:
Click Here for Example

Make sure you have it so that it can run ActiveX, or whatever.[/quote]
This would be a good suggestion, but there’s alot of problems surrounding it. I used to have a system quite like that, but Ifound it took forever to load on slower PC’s, some people don’t have Javascript enabled (FKY lol) It’s also hard to implement & update.
-JV

Read full topic

item.title: Lolism.org ~~ Rate, Advice & Feedback?
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Well, what i would suggest is that you add a little link under the picture that says “View All”. And when they click that a list comes up in a new window. And on the list you should have links to all of the pictures and when they click it a little window comes up with that picture.
Example:
Click Here for Example

Make sure you have it so that it can run ActiveX, or whatever.

Read full topic
